description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Account of the Mining Districts of Alston Moor, Weardale and Teesdale ... comprising descriptive sketches of the scenery, antiquities, geology and mining operations in the upper dales of the rivers Tyne, Wear, and Tees" Author: SOPWITH, Thomas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1430.f.21." Page: 169 Place of Publishing: Alnwick Date of Publishing: 1833 Publisher: W. Davison Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003443039 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
